ing: 8 large hard-boiled eggs, peeled and cut into chunks
4 large hard-boiled egg whites, cut into chunks
des: "I used to buy egg salad at my company's cafeteria. Learning this DIY recipe at home saved me a bunch of money! I hope you enjoy."
ins: Mix eggs, egg whites, mayonnaise, chives, mustard, celery salt, paprika, kosher salt, and black pepper together in a bowl.
